message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be highly valuable to your business. While I can't disclose specifics without a confidentiality agreement, I can assure you its worth is no less than $800000 to me. I'm confident it will be even more valuable to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000.  This is a limited-time offer, as another buyer is waiting in the wings.  Let me know if you're interested in discussing this further.
